xwikidoc.content: <vijay13> has quit 00:42 <vijay13> has quit 01:06 <vijay13> has quit 01:14 <vijay13> has quit 01:18 <vijay13_> has quit 01:25 <vijay13> has quit 01:36 <vijay13> has quit 01:43 <vijay13> has quit 01:55 <vijay13> has quit 02:12 <vijay13> has quit 11:04 <mcupak> has quit 15:11 <mcupak> has quit 15:12 <akats> has joined #phenotips 15:13 <akats> sdumitriu: What do you think about adding a slight background shade to cells of phenotypes that are not present instead of splitting it into several columns? 15:14 <akats> If the export is for both present and not present phenotypes, there would be a column running with either a "Yes" or a "No" and the phenotypes correlating to no would be shadowed. 15:16 <akats> And another question, how many layouts will be there? Several or are we going to make one and leave it "forever" 18:48 <akats> has quit
